&#3939;&#3906;&#3851;&#3924;: [2752] ... 1) lus kyi yan lag gi mdun ma/ ... lag tshigs/ ... lag sgrog  ... lag pa shor ba/ ... lag gnyis rgyab tu bsnol/ ... lag pas lag pa bsdams pa/ ... lag gdangs dpung sbrel/ ... rkang stabs lag stabs/ ... shing sdong lag btsugs/ ... lag pa dam po/ ... lag pa bkren pa/ ... lag pa lhod po/ ... lag 'dzangs/ ... lag pa mi spobs pa/ ... lag pa g.yar rogs/ ... za rgyu 'thung rgyu gnam gyi lag nyal sa dro po rang gi lag  ... lag par sha yod na nam mkha'i bya 'khor/ ... lag pa tsha dus skam pa/ ... ming gi rnam grangs la gcod byed dang/ 'jug par byed/ tha snyad ston byed/ dpung pa'i 'dab/ 'bab byed/ 'dzin byed/ yal ga lnga pa/ sug pa bcas so/ 2) tsa lag dang tsha lag dza lag tsa tsha dza ... tsa lhag tsha lhag  ... dza lhag  3) rgyu skar zhig  ... ming gi rnam grangs la nag mo dang/ drag mo/ drag shul ma/ dmag dpon dgra bcas so/ 4) (mngon) lag pa la g.yas g.yon gnyis yod pas grangs gnyis mtshon/ ...
The leg of the stand for a loom.  See Dag-yig 325.
1) arm, hand, fore leg * [2 tsa/ tsha/ dza lag = tsha tsha dza flag/ sign]; 3) motion star/ rgyu skar; 4) two. 1) arm, hand, fore leg; 3) motion star/ rgyu skar; 4) two
